comments.html:
Hi Ivan, is the concept of this multi-topology is basically the same thing as the "multi-area" or "multi-process" IS-IS to be precise. Thank you. :)

one more question, to you feel that the "multi-area IS-IS configuration" that often found in many docs should be referred to as "multi-process IS-IS configuration"? The wording of the area really made me mad, same like VTP, VLAN trunking procotol, that has nothing to do with VLAN trunking. 8-)
comments.name: Yap Chin Hoong

comments.html: They are three completely different topics. Will write about the other two as well.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
